process.description: TCP4-2250 Verify parallel exclusive gateway and different validations on the screen.
process.name: TCP4-2250 Verify parallel exclusive gateway and different validations on the screen
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_6" name="startEvent1" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_8" name="Parallel Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_16</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:parallelGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_8"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_11" name="Form Task 1" pm:screenRef="250" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_30</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_12" name="Form Task 2" pm:screenRef="251" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_16</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_2</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_19</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_11"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_16" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_12"/>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_17" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_19</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_23</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_25</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_19" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_17"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_20" name="Form Task 3" pm:screenRef="251" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_23</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_2</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_23" name="checkbox1" sourceRef="node_17" targetRef="node_20">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">checkbox1 == true</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_28" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_30</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_38</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_30" name="" sourceRef="node_11" targetRef="node_28"/>
    <bpmn:manualTask id="node_33" name="Manual Task 1" pm:screenRef="252" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_25</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_38</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:manualTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_25" name="checkbox2" sourceRef="node_17" targetRef="node_33">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">checkbox2 == true</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_38" name="" sourceRef="node_33" targetRef="node_28"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_2" name="" sourceRef="node_20" targetRef="node_12"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="190" y="90" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <dc:Bounds x="290" y="90" width="36" height="36"/>

      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">

        <di:waypoint x="308" y="108"/>
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="48"/>
        <di:waypoint x="438" y="48"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_16_di" bpmnElement="node_16">
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="108"/>
        <di:waypoint x="330" y="178"/>
        <di:waypoint x="438" y="178"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_17_di" bpmnElement="node_17">
        <dc:Bounds x="420" y="260" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_19_di" bpmnElement="node_19">
        <di:waypoint x="438" y="178"/>

      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_20_di" bpmnElement="node_20">
        <dc:Bounds x="490" y="310" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_23_di" bpmnElement="node_23">
        <di:waypoint x="438" y="278"/>
        <di:waypoint x="500" y="278"/>
        <di:waypoint x="548" y="348"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_28_di" bpmnElement="node_28">
        <dc:Bounds x="680" y="370" width="36" height="36"/>
